responsibilities: Led a cross-functional marketing campaign, increasing new user sign-ups by 22% in the first quarter using targeted email marketing and social media ads with HubSpot
Expanded Spotify's brand presence by launching a multi-channel advertising strategy, increasing app installs by 47% over a year
Organized a comprehensive SEO strategy using SEMrush, boosting organic search traffic by 18% and improving keyword rankings for the top nine industry terms
Monitored user behavior and retention metrics using Mixpanel, identified key drop-off points, and enacted changes that boosted retention by 26%
Implemented technical solutions in WordPress to enhance site speed, reducing load times by 53% and improving user experience
Enhanced product launch efficiency at Hulu by introducing Asana workflows, reducing time-to-market by 11 days
Collected and analyzed customer feedback via SurveyMonkey, leading to the development of four new features that increased customer satisfaction scores by 2.6 points
Processed and analyzed email campaign performance using Mailchimp, boosting click-through rates by 12% and open rates by 9%
Conducted A/B testing on email and web content, executing marketing that facilitated an 18% rise in campaign effectiveness
Managed social media content scheduling through Hootsuite, increasing post visibility by 33% and social engagement metrics by 27%
Analyzed campaign performance using Google Analytics, facilitating strategic adjustments that expanded website traffic by 18% and drove an extra $44,862 in online sales
Expanded the use of Salesforce CRM for tracking and managing customer interactions, improving lead-tracking efficiency by 24% and saving 18 hours per month

suggestions.suggestedText: Spearheaded a cross-functional campaign that amplified new user sign-ups by 22% within the first quarter through targeted email marketing and social media ads using HubSpot
suggestions.originalText: Led a cross-functional marketing campaign, increasing new user sign-ups by 22% in the first quarter using targeted email marketing and social media ads with HubSpot

suggestions.originalText: Enhanced product launch efficiency at Hulu by introducing Asana workflows, reducing time-to-market by 11 days

suggestions.suggestedText: Cataloged customer feedback through SurveyMonkey, enabling the development of four new features, that raised customer satisfaction scores by 2.6 points out of 10
